skilllist.skilldesc: Bane infuses his weapon with a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Tidal Energy</font> each time he uses a skill (up to 2 stacks). Each of his subsequent Basic Attacks consumes a stack to deal <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to <font color="fba51f"> (+95% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 4(+0.4*Hero Level)% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies.

Bane fires his Crab Claw Cannon in the target direction, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and then 150% damage to a random enemy behind them (prioritizes enemy heroes). Enemies hit are slowed by 10<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font>% for 1s.

Every 100 <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> Bane possesses reduces this skill's cooldown by an additional 8%.

Bane chugs his ale, recovering 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 5<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.5% Total Magic Power)</font>% of his lost HP and gaining 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: Bane spits venom in the target direction, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales up to 150% with charging time) to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Every 100 <font color="62f8fe">Magic Power</font> Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 7%.

Bane summons a school of sharks to charge in the target direction, dealing 600<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit, knocking them airborne for 0.8s, and slowing them by 75% (decays over 3s).
This skill deals 40% damage to turrets.

data.name: Bane

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

+6 Extra Physical Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: Dikson
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: Cruel pirate leader, Franco's sworn enemy.

assist.desc: Bane works best with heroes like as Tigreal and Luo Yi who can pull enemies together so he can do even more damage with his AOE.

strong.desc: Bane counters Tanks with high HP but low damage, such as Hylos and Belerick, because he can out-sustain them and deals HP percentage-based damage.

weak.desc: Bane is countered by Mages that deal heavy damage from afar, such as Vale and Xavier who can deal significant damage to him before he can get in range.
